page.title: 13Lord's Meadow
page.content: THE RUGBY CLUB The Clubhouse at the Rugby Club opened in 1965 it was built of brick and concrete blocks with a sloping roof. The stand on the main pitch was built on the 26th of October 1975 it will hold about a 160 people in it.Rugby has been played there for 106 years. The organisation of the club is Mr A.G Bond ,Chairman Mr P.R Harris,Vice Chairman,Mr J.Daws,Hon secretary,Mr M. Roach,Treasurer Mr J.Stapleton.The highest win that the Rugby club have won has been 96.0.There are four teams 1st,2nd,3rd and colts.The kits are black shorts and black shirts with a yellow stripe across the middle.The teams play about 42 games in a season.There are 3 pitches which the Rugby club play on.
